description: The file defines the `HomeScreen` widget for a Flutter calendar application, including UI layout, calendar behavior, and interaction with the `EventStore` to display and manage calendar events.

classes.name: HomeScreen
classes.description: A StatefulWidget representing the main calendar interface with event list and navigation options.

classes.name: _HomeScreenState
classes.description: State class managing the UI state, calendar interactions, and embedded widget building for HomeScreen.

methods.name: _buildCalendar
methods.description: Builds the calendar widget with event markers and interaction handlers.

methods.name: _buildDrawer
methods.description: Constructs the side navigation drawer with menu options.

methods.name: _emptyState
methods.description: Returns a widget to display when there are no events for the selected day.

methods.name: _friendlyDate
methods.description: Formats a DateTime object into a user-friendly string.
